resources.string: Have you ever wanted to look like a spooky dweeb? Click below to rent your segway for a haunted tour now!
Spooky Guy and Girl on Segways
Our company is not held liable for any injury or death sustained on said tour.
Join Haunted Harold and his assistant Spooky Sarah for a one-night only, fright-filled, 12-hour segway journey. For only $200, come experience Wheels of Torture!
